Recommendations: the level of vmgo awareness among external stakeholders may be increased through wider dissemination using television and onair radio programs aside from other forms of media

if the surveyresearch on the level of vmgo awareness understanding and acceptability will be presented in inhouse fora it is suggested that this be packaged using the required format and styles of research writing that includes the abstract references etc
the conduct of good educational practices and the implementation of planned activities towards attaining the goals and objectives of the program may be sustained
